name: Some Witty Shape Joke
description:
Some Witty Shape Joke

A game about fusing shapes to make a bigger shape so that you can make more shape juice to make more shapes

its an incremental abstract art game

Made for VGDA Spring 2019 Game Jam with the theme Fusion
-----
Benjamin Bowen - UI Design
Shannon Chang - Artist
Alex Chheng - Programmer
Brian Dizon - Programmer
Paco Ellaga - Sound Design
Paul Kosmala - Programmer
